storyInfo:
After Gavial arrives, she finds the right time to sober up Ceobe, and the situation stabilizes. 
After some conversation, Gavial realizes she was wrong to blame Zumama, but a fight is unavoidable.

attributes.content: I can't believe Reunion here is so tough. Hmph, I won't lose to you!
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: Tch, this silly girl.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Wake up!
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Hm? Where am I?
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: Oh, it's Gavial! Everyone else too!
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.options: Good morning.;......;(Bop her on the head)

attributes.content: Ehehe. Good morning, Doctor.
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: Um, Doctor looks a little scary right now. Did I do something wrong?
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: Doctor, please don't be mad...
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: Hnng... Doctor, that hurt.
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: Why did you bop me on the head...?
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: Looks like she's back to her senses, at least.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Kay, do you remember how you got here?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Umm... I forgot!
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Come lie down, I'll check and see if there's anything wrong with you. Don't run off again.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Okay~ Ehh, where are we?
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: We're... Hm, it's a long story. Just lie down already!
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Oohâ€”
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: Gavial, what the hell are you doing?
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Ugh, that's a long story too. Just let me work.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Ten minutes later...
Alright, everything looks okay. Go wait with the Doctor and don't wander off. If you do it again, it's no more honey biscuits for you.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Okay! Honey biscuits!
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: Are you done?
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: I'm done.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: So now can you tell me what the hell you're doing, Gavial?
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: *Sigh*, I said it's a long story. Short version is I'm here to look for you.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: You're not getting the engine back.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: That too. But there's another reason I'm looking for you.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Another reason?
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Do you have your people mining ore?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: ...Tch.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Gavial, I never took you for the sore loser type.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Are you that broken up about being beaten by the Big, Ugly Thing?
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: No, your Big Ugly Whatever is great. I'm totally fine with that.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: But if you're putting your people at risk of Oripathy infection for the sake of some ore, then as a doctor I have no choice but to stop you.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Huh? Oripathy? Oh, you're talking about Stone Disease.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: I'm not putting anyone at risk.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: I told them many times to stay away from the depths of the mine.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: But your people are getting infected!
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: There's always someone who doesn't listen. I can't control them all. Isn't that right, Yogi?
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Yes, my brother wanted to dig out more ore for the Great Chief, so he went deeper into the mine.
attributes.name: Yogi

attributes.content: Huh? Why didn't you say so earlier?!
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: You didn't ask.
attributes.name: Yogi

attributes.content: That's pretty important...!
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.options: You told me they don't take Oripathy seriously here.;.......;You really didn't ask.

attributes.content: Agh, fine.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Doctor, did I really not ask?!
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Agh, Doctor, take my side here!
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Also...
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Hey, why are you taking your clothes off?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Huh? Your body...
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: I've been running around the mine ever since I was a kid. It's only natural I would get the Stone Disease.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: I dare say no one knows better than me where the diseased rocks are.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: All right then.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: My mistake. Sorry for accusing you, Zumama.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: It's fine.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Eh, that's all it took?! We're all good now?!
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Isn't everybody supposed to stubbornly stick to their guns until we all end up in one big honkin' battle?
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Ya shouldn't hope fer stuff like that!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Then let's talk about the other thing.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: You have our engine, don't you?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Can you return that to us? We can't leave without it.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: If you want to leave, I can have someone escort you.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: No good. Kal'tsit will get mad.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: You won't hand it over no matter what?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: No matter what.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Oh, looks like we're gonna fight after all.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Looks like it.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: That was the plan from the very beginning.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Oh, are we fighting that? Fun!
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Hello, nice to meet you!
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: ...High Priest, why did you bring the Big Ugly out?
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Huh? Aren't we going to fight Gavial? Do we not need it? If not, I'll drive it back. I still want to test the engine.
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: ...We need it, but not now. I still have something to say.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Oh, alright. You have your talk first then. Call me when you want to fight!
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: Sure.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Hey, what was that about an engine?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: That's right, your engine is powering the Big Ugly right now. If you want it, you'll have to fight for it.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Hehe. Deal!
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Come with me. We'll see who comes out on top.
attributes.name: Eunectes
